content:
Can you write a JavaScript function that generates a pun using the words "student" and "test"? The pun should be randomly selected from an array of puns that includes:
- "Why did the student study for the test in the sauna? He wanted a higher degree."
- "Why was the math book sad? Because it had too many problems."
- "Why did the teacher wear sunglasses? Because his class was so bright."
- "Why did the student fail his history test? He thought World War II was fought between Facebook and Twitter."
Feel free to add your own puns to the array!
